name: In re Assignment of Judge Tama Myers CLARK. Petition of Court Administrator Zygmont A. Pines and the Honorable Pamela Pryor Dembe
name_abbreviation: In re Assignment of Judge Clark

parties: In re Assignment of Judge Tama Myers CLARK. Petition of Court Administrator Zygmont A. Pines and the Honorable Pamela Pryor Dembe.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of July, 2009, it is hereby ordered that the Emergency Petition for Issuance of Rule to Show Cause is dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
977 A.2d 1089
In re Assignment of Judge Tama Myers CLARK. Petition of Court Administrator Zygmont A. Pines and the Honorable Pamela Pryor Dembe.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 29, 2009.
